thread.section_title: ShopTo.Net Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.shopto.net | 15 of 965
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text:
I got the game in good time but the setup required to pre-order was incredibly broken. First of all, I couldn't set up an account with ShopTo using the intended email address. And then when I tried to use an alternative email I found it had set up with the original email without any notification to say so.
When I finally got access to this acccount and pre-ordered the game, it ended up doing so twice. This is really frustrating when you get charged before dispatch and can't get a full refund without phoning. Luckily my brother wanted a copy, but I will be very hesitant to pre-order again without certainty that the interface won't break and give me an unwanted outcome.
